Rulings.Edison: If this card  is flipped face-down, leaves the field, or has its effects negated, its ATK becomes 0, permanently.
Rulings.Tengu: If this card  is flipped face-down, leaves the field, or has its effects negated, its ATK becomes 0, permanently.

Rulings.Base: 1. If a face-down monster is used as a Fusion Material Monster, the original ATK of the face-down monster will be applied to determine the original ATK of "Evil HERO Dark Gaia".

PSCT.Edison:
1 Fiend monster + 1 Rock monster
● Must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion". 
● The original ATK of this card becomes the combined original ATK of the materials used for its Fusion Summon. 
● When this card declares an attack: You can change all Defense Position monsters your opponent controls to face-up Attack Position. (Flip effects are not activated at this time.)

PSCT.Base:
1 Fiend-Type monster + 1 Rock-Type monster
Must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. The original ATK of this card is equal to the combined original ATK of the Fusion Material Monsters used to Fusion Summon it. When this card declares an attack: You can change all Defense Position monsters your opponent controls to face-up Attack Position. (Flip Effects are not activated at this time.)
